author: Редакция
title: Дожди с грозами и пыльные бури ожидаются в Казахстане - Телеканал «Астана»
text:
В предстоящие трое суток атмосферные фронты будут оказывать влияние на погоду большей части страны, пройдут дожди с грозами, шквалистым ветром, в отдельных районах ожидаются сильные дожди с выпадением града. В южных регионах Казахстана прогнозируются пыльные бури, передает Astana TV.
Что касается температурного фона, то ожидается постепенное понижение температуры воздуха, однако столбики термометров в северной половине страны в дневные часы достигнут отметки 20-30 тепла, в южной – 25-35 тепла.

author: DPA
title: Influential French cardinal: 'The pope is tired' - NewsBreak
text: French Cardinal Jean-Marc Aveline called for prayers to be said for Pope Francis during a press conference in the Vatican on Thursday. "He is tired. He is one of those people who has to be taken to hospital if we really want them to get better. Otherwise they never recover," the influential archbishop of Marseille told journalists. Francis was admitted to Rome's Gemelli Hospital on Friday last week. There is currently no indication when he might be discharged. Francis had resisted going to hospital since mid-December, despite evident health problems. Aveline said he had no more precise information and would not engage in speculation. But he also expressed his concern. The 66-year-old cardinal is among the possible successors to Francis. Earlier on Thursday, the Corriere della Sera newspaper reported that Francis had been in jovial mood when Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni popped in to visit him in hospital where he is fighting off pneumonia in both lungs. "The doctors have said that I have to watch my health, otherwise I would go straight to heaven," the 88-year-old pontiff said, according to the report. "I know that there are people outside there who say my time has come," he added. Meloni visited the pope on Wednesday, for an audience lasting around 20 minutes. Her office subsequently reported that Francis had been awake and alert. "We joked constantly. He has not lost his proverbial sense of humour," Meloni said after the visit. The Vatican reported that the pope had spent a sixth "restful night" in hospital without further complication. He had got up and taken breakfast in an armchair, the Vatican statement said. The pope was admitted after falling ill with bronchitis. Concerns grew following a Tuesday update in which the Vatican reported that he was suffering from double pneumonia. While there are more than 250 cardinals around the world, only 138 of them are under the age threshold of 80 and will participate in the conclave to elect the next pope. The conclave sits in secrecy in the Sistine Chapel. A plume of white smoke from the chapel's chimney indicates that a decision has reached.

author: tromperri
title: #17 Sánchez: "Israel está provocando un sufrimiento insoportable"
text:
[MirandesOnline](/user/MirandesOnline)a [rtve.es](/go/link/3890343) [#9](c9#c-9) mientras que los rabos de los otros no sean rabos de genocidas, es una mejora.
Porque mucho viva España pero los peperos son los primeros que ponen el culo para apoyar a cualquier extranjero dispuesto a hacer una buena matanza de gente que vive en la edad de piedra.
[#1](c1#c-1) Junto con China, creo que fuimos de los primeros gobiernos en adoptar una postura sensata sin caer en la equidistancia: "Hamas cometió un atentado muy grave contra Israel pero el alcance del derecho a la defensa del agredido tiene un límite que ya ha sido sobrepasado".
[#4](c4#c-4) poco pillara con unas elecciones recién ganadas y cuatro años de gobierno por delante.
Está declaración no le va a dar nada y le puede hacer perder mucho.
Y solo por eso, esta es la segunda vez que me alegro de que esté señor este en la Moncloa y no un pepero. (Si casado hubiera sido presidente en la pandemia me horroriza la cantidad de muertos que hubiera habido)
Me gusta que el presidente de nuestra nación se coloque en una posición de justicia, en vez de arrastrarse comiendo rabos de los intereses extranjeros mientras grita "Viva Ejpaña" con el rabo de alguien de otro país hasta la garganta.
[#4](c4#c-4) si estuviera callado le criticarías que no condenada nada….
Algunos sois prototipos Belarra, todo mal.
[#7](c7#c-7) hay que saber mantenerse al margen, llevas muchas vidas en tu barco. Solo lo hace buscando algo. Ese algo ya se descubrirá con el tiempo. Supongo que un puesto en algun organismo político internacional. Es lo que le pone.
[#4](c4#c-4) A quien le sale a ingresar es a los palestinos masacrados por Israel. A ingresar cadáveres en fosas comunes.

author: Von Cosima Lutz
title: Protein und Muskelaufbau: Doch im Spiegel blickt ihnen stets ein dünner Kerl entgegen - WELT
text: Junge Männer verpulvern ihr Geld für Proteine, und Frauen glauben, dabei ginge es um sie. Tatsächlich dreht es sich beim Muskel-Wahn allein um Männer, die auf Männer starren. Ist der dicke Oberarm die sozial verträgliche Version des Messers?

author: Business Standard
title: India Inc eyes growth in 2024, plans to boost hiring, investments
text:
Chief executives of Indian companies are planning to hire and invest more in the New Year as they expect the economy to post healthy growth in the election year of 2024. General elections are expected to be held inApril and May.
A poll of nearly two dozen chief executive officers (CEOs) shows that an overwhelming majority of business leaders expect a revival in rural consumer spending and a rise in foreign direct investment (FDI) inflows as global companies increase their presence in the country.
According to a dipstick survey conducted in De­ce­mber across India by Business Standard, the biggest worry Also Read Statsguru: Attracting foreign direct investment will need more effort VC investment in Indian startups declines by 76.4% YoY in H1 2023: Report India's direct tax mop-up in FY24 rises 16% to Rs 4.75 trillion so far India's direct tax collection up 17.6% to Rs 12.3 trillion till Nov 9: CBDT How NRIs can invest in govt bonds through RBI's retail direct scheme Cadila Pharma CMD booked for alleged rape, assault on Bulgarian woman Pilot unions express concern as Air India 'threats of appropriate measures' Indiabulls HFC may have to provide Rs 1,000 cr for AIF investments impact 2024 to see surge in new-age tech IPOs as macroeconomic headwinds ease No pre-election lull in execution, orders so far, say cement, steel firms Topics : India Inc Investments Foreign direct investment Dec 31 2023 | 11:32 PM IST

author: Redacción Correo
title: Dina Boluarte responde a críticas y cuestiona a exministros: "No hicieron nada contra la delincuencia"
text:
En medio de la creciente preocupación por la inseguridad ciudadana, la presidenta Dina Boluarte salió al frente para defender la actuación de su gobierno y lanzar duras críticas a quienes gestionaron el Ministerio del Interior en el pasado.
“Muchos de ellos que ahora salen y critican, en su momento no hicieron nada por frenar la delincuencia, pese a que tenían la información y la oportunidad para actuar”, sostuvo.
La mandataria afirmó que su administración está enfrentando mafias y organizaciones criminales que se han fortalecido durante décadas, producto —según dijo— de la indiferencia y falta de acción de gobiernos anteriores. Aclaró que no se trata de una queja, sino de un mensaje claro de que el Ejecutivo está tomando medidas concretas para revertir la situación.
Entre esas acciones, mencionó el incremento del presupuesto destinado al Ministerio del Interior, el fortalecimiento de la Policía Nacional —que, recalcó, fue debilitada en gestiones anteriores—, y la mejora de la infraestructura en comisarías, cárceles y servicios de serenazgo municipal.
Boluarte también se dirigió a los transportistas, quienes han denunciado asesinatos y extorsiones en distintas regiones. A ellos les aseguró que la policía trabaja de forma incansable para capturar a los responsables y devolver la tranquilidad a las carreteras.

author: Commercial-News, Danville, Ill.
title: Illinois WORKS Pre-Apprenticeship Program celebrates cohort graduation
text:
Commercial-News, Danville, Ill. Illinois WORKS Pre-Apprenticeship Program celebrates cohort graduation Commercial-News, Danville, Ill. Thu, December 26, 2024 at 8:17 PM UTC 2 min read
Dec. 26—Danville Area Community College (DACC) celebrated the graduation of the 4th cohort of the Illinois WORKS Pre-Apprenticeship Program recently in the Technology Center.
A total of 19 students graduated from the program, which began at the start of the fall semester and ran for 16 weeks, with classes held Monday through Thursday for three hours each day. These students earned $14.50 an hour while attending school.
The Illinois WORKS Pre-Apprenticeship Program, offered in partnership with DACC, prepares participants for registered apprenticeships in high-demand trades such as carpentry, plumbing, and construction. Students earn valuable trade experience and certifications while completing 18 college credit hours toward a traditional degree. Graduates have the opportunity to continue their education at DACC or enter the workforce immediately, a news release states.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement The program is funded by an Illinois WORKS Pre-Apprenticeship grant from the Illinois Department of Commerce and Economic Opportunity (IDCEO). Over the past two years, DACC has received more than $850,000 to support the program and has applied for funding for a third grant year.
The program is currently accepting applications for limited seats in the 5th cohort, which will begin on Jan. 22.
"The Nation and the State of Illinois recognize the skilled labor shortage," said Professor Doug Hunter, Illinois WORKS Program Coordinator at DACC. "The Illinois Works grant is a program designed to help alleviate that problem. Good jobs are going unfilled, and the prognosis is that the problem will continue unless additional steps are taken to promote skilled trades. DACC has partnered with Illinois Works to recruit and prepare students to enter DOL-registered apprenticeship programs throughout the State."
For more information about the program, contact Doug Hunter at d.hunter@dacc.edu or Natasha Pounds at n.merangoli@dacc.edu , or call 217-443-8882.
